CssProperty.name: grid-column-end
CssProperty.description: Determine a grid item’s size and location within the grid by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement.

CssProperty.name: grid-column-start
CssProperty.description: Determine a grid item’s size and location within the grid by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement.

CssProperty.name: grid-row-end
CssProperty.description: Determine a grid item’s size and location within the grid by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement.

CssProperty.name: grid-row-start
CssProperty.description: Determine a grid item’s size and location within the grid by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement.

CssProperty.name: grid-gap
CssProperty.description: Shorthand that specifies the gutters between grid columns and grid rows in one declaration.

CssProperty.name: grid-column-gap
CssProperty.description: Specifies the gutters between grid columns.

CssProperty.name: grid-row-gap
CssProperty.description: Specifies the gutters between grid rows.

CssProperty.name: grid-template
CssProperty.description: Shorthand for setting grid-template-columns, grid-template-rows, and grid-template-areas in a single declaration.

CssProperty.name: grid-template-areas
CssProperty.description: Specifies named grid areas, which are not associated with any particular grid item, but can be referenced from the grid-placement properties.

CssProperty.name: grid-template-columns
CssProperty.description: Specifies, as a space-separated track list, the line names and track sizing functions of the grid.

CssProperty.name: grid-template-rows
CssProperty.description: Specifies, as a space-separated track list, the line names and track sizing functions of the grid

CssProperty.name: grid-area
CssProperty.description: Determine a grid item’s size and location within the grid by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement. Shorthand for 'grid-row-start', 'grid-column-start', 'grid-row-end', and 'grid-column-end'.

CssProperty.name: grid-auto-columns
CssProperty.description: Specifies the size of implicitly created columns.

CssProperty.name: grid-auto-rows
CssProperty.description: Specifies the size of implicitly created rows.

CssProperty.name: grid-auto-flow
CssProperty.description: Controls how the auto-placement algorithm works, specifying exactly how auto-placed items get flowed into the grid.
